articles.title: Seized Cash Pile Covers Entire Bed, Bihar Officials Can't Stop Counting
articles.description: A huge amount of cash has been seized from the home of a drugs inspector in Bihar's Patna. Officials of the vigilance department who raided the home of drugs inspector Jitendra Kumar took several hours to count the currency notes.
articles.content:
Officials count the seized notes as part of investigation into assets case

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Joe Biden signs landmark gun measure, says ‘lives will be saved’
articles.description: The legislation will toughen background checks for the youngest gun buyers, keep firearms from more domestic violence offenders and help states put in place red flag laws that make it easier for authorities to take weapons from people adjudged to be dangerous.
articles.content: President Joe Biden on Saturday signed the most sweeping gun violence bill in decades, a bipartisan compromise that seemed unimaginable until a recent series of mass shootings, including the massacre… [+2335 chars]

articles.title: Punjab: Arrested IAS officer Sanjay Popli's son dies of bullet wound, cops say suicide; family alleges foul play
articles.description: A 27-year-old son of IAS officer Sanjay Popli, currently under arrest in a graft case, died of bullet wounds here on Saturday, with police saying he committed suicide but family alleging foul play.
articles.content:
Tribune News Service
Chandigarh, June 25

articles.title: Activist Teesta Setalvad Detained A Day After Court Ruling On 2002 Riots
articles.description: Teesta Setlavad was a co-petitioner in the case that was dismissed by the Supreme Court a day ago that challenged Prime Minister Narendra Modi's exoneration in the 2002 Gujarat riots.
articles.content:
The Gujarat ATS detained Teesta Setalvad from her Mumbai home.
